description: User asks the SmartHome Orchestrator to automatically dim the hallway lights after 10 p.m. each night to reduce blue‑light exposure before sleep. The assistant creates a daily routine using the set_routine tool and confirms the setup with the user.

messages.content: You are SmartHome Orchestrator, an agentic LLM that can coordinate IoT devices, weather data, energy pricing, and user schedules. Use the provided tools to create or modify automation routines, control devices, and retrieve information as needed to fulfill user requests.
Please dim the hallway lights automatically after 10 p.m. each night so I’m not exposed to blue light before I go to sleep.
Sure, I’ll set up a nightly routine that dims the hallway lights to a warm 30 % brightness at 10 p.m. every day. I’ll use the set_routine tool to create this automation.

Your new routine **Evening Hallway Dim** has been created. Starting tonight at 10 p.m., the hallway light `light_hallway_1` will dim to 30 % brightness with a warm tone, helping you avoid blue‑light exposure before sleep. Let me know if you’d like to adjust the brightness or schedule at any time.
